entries.meaning: (Internet, video game and card game slang) Necromancer.

verbs.description: necro (third-person singular simple present necroes or necros, present participle necroing, simple past and past participle necroed)

entries.meaning: (Internet) To make a new post to a forum discussion that has been dormant for a long time, making the thread visible in the list of active topics; to bump.
examples: Sorry to necro a comment from three years ago, but â€¦

entries.meaning: (Internet, video games and card games slang) To practice necromancy; to bring back from the dead.
